page.description: Define what should happen when the session expires - display a message or automatically redirect the user to another page.

discussion.p: The *[ui:After session timeout action]* defines what happens after the session has expired.

item.name: Nothing
item.description: Displays a session expired message in the warning dialog box.

item.name: Redirect To Another Page
item.description: Redirects the user to another page after the session expires.

description.p: To redirect the user back to the Tabbed UI, specify <self> as the [target page].
